subject: Real Estate
title: Property Tax: The Oldest Tax
description: Learn Property Tax: The Oldest Tax in one minute.

hook.text: Property tax predates income tax by thousands of years. Ancient Egyptians taxed land before they taxed labor.

twist.text: In California, Proposition 13 froze assessments at purchase price. Long-term owners pay far less than new buyers.

climax.text: Property tax shapes who can afford to stay in a neighborhood and who gets priced out.

punchline.text: The tax on your home funds the town around it.
